arts.ttl: Doekhi scores double as Union Berlin beat Borussia Monchengladbach
arts.sum: An early double from Danilho Doekhi helps Union Berlin on their way to a 3-1 victory over Borussia Monchengladbach, who remain winless in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Preview | Union Berlin vs Borussia Mönchengladbach: Baumgart aims to stall Gladbach resurgence
arts.sum: Gladbach travel to the capital tonight looking for their first league win of the season. Whilst a win for Union Berlin could lift them up to sixth. Gladbach are the…
